about.title: Our Vision
about.description: Studism's mission is to make learning more free and enjoyable. Everyone has their own learning style. Late nights studying alone, days when friends keep you going—it's all part of learning. You don't have to be perfect. What matters is being able to continue at your own pace. We deliver these learning experiences through the power of technology.
about.mobileFirstDesc: Simple and easy-to-use applications that enable learning anytime, anywhere
about.dataVisualizationDesc: Support efficient learning through detailed learning data recording and analysis
about.customizationDesc: Support continuous growth with personalized learning plans and goal setting

apps.title: Our Apps
apps.description: Introducing learning applications developed by Studism. Each app is designed to support your learning journey.

sakuraenglish.name: SakuraEnglish
sakuraenglish.description: Efficiently strengthen your vocabulary with level-based word quizzes. Create your own learning plan with custom word list features.
sakuraenglish.fullDescription: An app that efficiently strengthens your vocabulary with level-based word quizzes. Choose from 5 levels (Lev1-Lev5) to match your skill level, and create your own learning plan with the custom word list feature. With the review function for missed words and proficiency tracking, you can steadily improve your English skills.
sakuraenglish.featureDesc1: Study at your own pace with 5 difficulty levels
sakuraenglish.featureDesc3: Review missed words and track proficiency

timelyze.name: Timelyze
timelyze.description: Easily record and manage your study time. Build study habits with intuitive controls and receive continuous support until you reach your goals.
timelyze.fullDescription: A time management app that makes recording and managing study time easy. Supports timer-based tracking and manual input, with time aggregation by subject. Visualize learning data with daily, weekly, and monthly graphs. Calendar and memo features help you build efficient study habits.
timelyze.featureDesc1: Timer and manual input with subject-based aggregation
timelyze.featureDesc2: Analyze with daily, weekly, and monthly graphs

studism.name: Studism
studism.description: A place where learners gather. Understand, connect, expand your world.
studism.fullDescription: Studism is a new learning SNS where students can connect and learn together. Share your study struggles, ask questions about problems you don't understand, or find helpful learning videos. Studism supports your learning journey.
studism.featureDesc2: Share how much you've studied with other app integrations
studism.featureDesc3: Deepen your understanding with short and long-form educational videos
studism.screenshotDesc2: Share your study progress with connected apps
studism.screenshotDesc3: Deepen understanding with short and long videos

mamemame.name: MameMame
mamemame.description: Make learning classical Japanese vocabulary more fun and efficient. MameMame is a learning app that helps you master classical Japanese words needed for university entrance exams through engaging quizzes.
mamemame.fullDescription: An app that efficiently strengthens classical Japanese vocabulary through part-of-speech quizzes. Further subdivided by conjugation forms within each part of speech for even clearer and easier learning. Create your own vocabulary lists or share them with friends. Missed words are automatically added to a review list with re-appearance and mastery tracking, helping you improve your classical Japanese skills efficiently and effectively.
mamemame.featureDesc1: Master each part of speech with categorized quizzes
mamemame.featureDesc2: Create your own vocabulary lists and share with friends
mamemame.featureDesc3: Visualize review progress and mastered words
mamemame.screenshotDesc1: Master each part of speech with categorized quizzes
mamemame.screenshotDesc2: Create your own vocabulary lists and share with friends
mamemame.screenshotDesc3: Visualize review progress and mastered words

topMessage.paragraph1:
"I wish I had known earlier." "I could have done it more efficiently."
Looking back on our learning journey, these thoughts often come to mind.
topMessage.paragraph2:
There might have been a better way. We could have managed our time better.
From these experiences, we decided to create this service.
topMessage.paragraph3:
We want to create a world where everyone can learn in a good environment the moment they want to learn.
Regardless of where you live, what school you attend, or what family you were born into.
With just a smartphone, you can grow at your own pace, anytime, anywhere.
We want to deliver such learning experiences through the power of technology.
That is our wish.
topMessage.appDescription1: With the English learning app "SakuraEnglish," get quality input in your spare time.
topMessage.appDescription2: With the time management app "Timelyze," turn effort into numbers and make habits your ally.
topMessage.appDescription3: With the learning SNS "Studism," record your learning, connect with peers, and maintain motivation.
topMessage.keyMessage:
Learn → Manage → Share.
When these three come together, learning transforms from "something to work hard at" to "something that continues."
topMessage.paragraph4:
We support those who learn.
Students studying late into the night. Working professionals aiming to improve their skills after work. People who challenge new things no matter their age.
topMessage.paragraph5:
So that each person's effort leads to solid results.
For that, we will continue to refine our services.

philosophy.missionDesc: We want to share the joy of learning with as many people as possible. Studying isn't something to endure—it's a wonderful experience of discovery and growth. We're making that experience more accessible and enjoyable through technology.

philosophy.value1Desc: You don't have to be perfect. What matters is being able to continue.
philosophy.value2Desc: Solo study and learning with peers—it's all part of "learning."
